title: Can we start dishing out instapermabans?
body: Like, to those who are last pick and refuse to play anything but one role, yet also refuse to dodge - who then 99% of the time go on to play with malicious intent. Or does Riot know that they will lose too much money cleaning up the community in such a swift yet effective manner?

replies.body:
End of the day Riot wont lose any money if they clean up the player base.

But really, perhaps you would do better to go off and read some red posts regarding player behavior so you can see that shit is already being done.

hit the nail on the head m8, on everything you've said. i hope it comes back and bites rito in their greedy asses. if league vanished 5eva tomorrow id be glad, im only still playing cos its here, and.....im able to so.....YEAH. cant wait til overwatch, hoping the 12 year old trolls dont know who blizzard are so they dont just play and feed in that game too

There is no rule. If you want to incorporate such a strategy, then I'm all for it. I've won a game in high diamond where someone purposely picked for double jungle and incorporated a nice strategy - we actually ended before 20 minutes. However you and I both know the players that I'm referring to. Those stubborn fuckwits who say 'kk double adc bot' when a higher pick has chosen adc with malicious intent, in case you needed an example.

double ADCs work only if they work together in a premade/duo.

Other than that, you're right these guys should be punished, *for malicious intent*, not breaking the meta, I'd never agree with anyone who'd instantly report the double ADC bot even if the game ended with one or both of the ADCs feeding but not intentionally.
Hmmm. Never seen a duo ADC

Well the goal is to get an ADC who's good at AFK farming with a bit of poke and an ADC who's good at being greedy and a bit of farm.

AFK farm ADC pokes enemies a bit until they're at half, greedy ADC gets fed.

I did this as Veigar bot carry with Ezreal support, but we'd constantly switch between farming and being greedy depending on our HP and power spikes. I ended up giving Ezreal a lot of kills early game but when I had enough AP to instant nuke their AP support and ADC, I switched to killing alone and Ezreal just farmed.
and like I sed it is not a banable thing

Playing the game with malicious intent is. Which is precisely what those who pick like that do. Yet they don't get banned. They just force queue dodges and never learn. Given you still don't understand my point you're probably one of those players.
hahahah and you don't get my point there is no rule on it so don't b!tch about it

Well Riot would rather be criticised for their slow action than bad choices, you haven't considered the fact that people don't always report honestly (If the minority who actively participate in forums complain about the theoretical majority of trolls, then the majority will troll the system) and an automated system can still go wrong even if it's tried and tested in a contained environment (So instead they're easing it very slowly into the actual game). 'dishing out instabans' is easier said than done but there's no 'swift yet effective' way to get it accurately (Have you tried making a survey asking if people lie to surveys or not? That's pretty much how asking trolls to report other trolls is like)

They're getting there, though.

tl;dr: How the hell are we going to dish out insta perma bans without manually checking each case and not get a single wrong case with so little to work with?

I struggle to understand why people consider playing ranked if they can only play one champion/role. Your chances, especially at lower tiers, is slim to none of actually playing that specific champion/role. I actually just played a game with a Jinx/Ezreal bot lane, and the Jinx intentionally fed because Ezreal instalocked in champion select and was taking farm. It's quite a shame that people like this still actively play league. I don't think it'll ever stop though. 

The punishment system Riot has currently evidently isn't working as people like this exist and are able to play continually. Punishments need to be harsher imo.
